hero.title: Divorcy will help you plan and estimate the costs of your divorce
hero.subtitle: Having a divorce sucks! Divorcy helps you make smart and swift decisions. So you can start focusing on your future - not your past!

subscribe.description: It'll help you to understand whole process as well as save time & cost

getStarted.header:: Hello, I'm here for helping you get overview further process!
getStarted.description: We're gonna ask some basic questions and it probably takes about 5 minutes.

forecast.subtitle: Here's expected cost & recommendations of next steps.

result.teaser: After assessment we recommends the following steps that can help you to process further...
result.tooltip: One time costs are for lawyers and court fees. The ongoing costs are only for possible alimoney payments for the children.
result.disclaimer: * Diese Kosten basieren auf Deinen Angaben und sind nur eine Indikation. Eine Scheidung kann viele Folgekosten mit sich bringen.
result.journeytooltip: Basierend auf deinen Angaben haben wir dich in eine Phase eingeordnet. Klick einfach auf die anderen Phasen um zu sehen, was dahinter steckt.

privacy.preAnchorCopy: Hereby I confirm that I took note of
